mapper.sql: SELECT C.CUSTOMER_NO, C.CUSTOMER_TITLE, C.CUSTOMER_CATEGORY, C.CUSTOMER_ENROLLDATE, C.CUSTOMER_MODIFYDATE, C.CUSTOMER_CONTENT, C.CUSTOMER_ORIGINALFILENAME, C.CUSTOMER_RENAMEDFILENAME, C.CUSTOMER_COUNT, C.CUSTOMER_STATUS, C.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID AS M_MEMBER_ID FROM CUSTOMER C LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON (C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO)
